definition[0]_en: A collection accrual policy that seeks, acquires, and adds items to a collection.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A collection accrual policy that seeks, acquires, and adds items to a collection.

definition[0]_en: A collection accrual policy that does not add items to a collection.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A collection accrual policy that does not add items to a collection.

definition[0]_en: A collection accrual policy that adds items to a collection when the items are in scope for the collection but have been acquired for other reasons.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A collection accrual policy that adds items to a collection when the items are in scope for the collection but have been acquired for other reasons.

definition[0]_en: A collection accrual policy that adds items to one or more subcollections of a collection.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A collection accrual policy that adds items to one or more subcollections of a collection.
